City Council Meetings

Regular City Council meetings are scheduled for 7 pm on the 3rd Tuesday of the month at Talty City Hall- 9700 CR 213, Talty TX 75126 

No meeting will be held October 21st due to the lack of necessary action items. 

TRAFFIC PAYMENTS

Pay with a card:

www.trafficpayment.com

(800)444-1187

Questions for court:

courtclerk@taltytexas.com

ACCIDENT REPORTS

Please access the statewide site:

https://cris.dot.state.tx/us/public/

Welcome to Talty
We are a small community only 25 miles east of Downtown Dallas. Located south of Forney on I-20, we currently have developments offering one acre residential lots. We welcome those interested in commercial and residential properties to contact us about developing available parcels in a manner compatible with our community's vision.
